Html:
Just wondering if anyone has figured out what settings work best when gearing for the General.  So far I'm setting in FSR to 100%, dropping the replenishment buff and BoW/Mana Spring from the buff tab, and removing the use of mana potions.  I want to optimize for burst, but I haven't figured out how to specify things like that when using the batch tools.  I use the batch tools because I want to keep my primary healing and shadow sets fully optimized and build my General set the best I can around that.

Anyone have any pointers?

Oh, and on a similar note, any idea how to batch optimize and have a resistance set? (ie for Hodir)

 

Thanks for your help!
